title: Clock
description:
Smart Data Models Program adaptation of the original IoTData data Models. This Resource describes the properties associated with clock and time.
Clock is a time information.
The Property "datetime" is using RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: "2007-04-05T14:30Z") (Time+Date+Timezone)
The Property "countdown" is the desired total seconds for countdown.

countdown.description: Property. The desired total seconds for countdown.

datetime.description: Property. Rhe date time using RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: 2007-04-05T14:30:00Z, 2007-04-05T14:30:00+09:00).

n.description: Property. Friendly name of the Resource

if.description: Property. The OCF Interface set supported by this Resource.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be Clock
